a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan:
Included are
interstate
,
intrastate
, and
extrasystemic
conflicts that were ongoing that year.
Data source: Uppsala Conflict Data Program and Peace Research Institute Oslo (2025); Natural Earth (2022)
Note: Some conflicts affect several regions. The sum across all regions can therefore be higher than the global number.
